channel.title: Less is better comments on Ruby Bridge and Whidbey RTM

item.title: "Ruby Bridge and Whidbey RTM": comment by Anson Tsao
item.description: Just want to point out that C++ uses an entirely different Intellisense engine than C#

item.title: "Ruby Bridge and Whidbey RTM" by jlam
item.description:
I just installed the Whidbey RTM bits on a vmware computer tonight. So far I was able to get my Ruby bridge recompiled under the RTM bits and all of my unit tests pass!

Hopefully I won’t run into Intellisense issues like some other folks. Worst case, I’ll just write my MC++ code using emacs :)
